sn9.4:3.1: 4. Sambahulasutta
sn9.4:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ sambahulā bhikkhū kosalesu viharanti aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9.4:4.2: Atha kho te bhikkhū vassaṃvuṭṭhā temāsaccayena cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu.
sn9.4:4.3: Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā te bhikkhū apassantī paridevamānā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
sn9.4:6.1: Evaṃ vutte, aññatarā devatā taṃ devataṃ gāthāya paccabhāsi:
